name: Women Entrepreneurship Platform
goal:
WEP is an international non-profit organization representing women entrepreneurs across Europe. Based in Brussels, we strive to represent and be the voice of women entrepreneurs to the European Parliament, and to develop a solid dialogue with EU institutions and policy makers.

WEP counts over 10 women's organizations from across Europe as its members and we are the Secretariat for the EU Interest Group on Women's Entrepreneurship at the European Parliament.
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: Gender Equality policies and related legislation, women entrepreneurship policies, SME-related legislation and policies, social inclusion and employment policies and legislation
